text: swn phu thi mi samarth ha (thas) di k txng thuxsil xd sxng deuxn tidtx kan kxn thi khea thang sxng ca tæatxng tx kan (rwm hlab nxn) sahrab phu thi mi samarth ca thuxsil xd di k txng hı xahar kæ khn yakcn canwn hk sib khn thangni pheux ca hı phwk cea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh nan khux khxbkhet khx ngxallxhˌ læa sahrab phwk ptiseth sraththa nan ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xyang cebpwd
